that's the only drive i see recognized on the dmesg. Are you sure the dvd is well plugged (ide and power)
hda and hdb are hard disk the only optical drive is hdc: PLEXTOR CD-R PX-W1610A, ATAPI CD/DVD-ROM drive
so the other drive is not detected for some reason
only one drive for each device file and viceversa
where should my jumper be?
you have the two optical drives on the same ide cable? if so check that both have their jumpers set to cable select or that one is master and the other slave
also check power connectors etc
also as other said check if they are recogniced in the bios
